b'The duty to track the person on record is of the police station of residence and of Police Station/s arrested from.
Keeping track of past criminals suspected to be active is in these police stations.
Failure is happening here.
Supervisors r duty-bound to inspect & question.'

b"When persons on criminal record remain active in committing heinous crimes we must find out the trail of the failure. Corrective measures must follow. It's not a case of one police station but the whole state and interstate. Criminal intelligence must be strengthened to detect. https://t.co/cpGgBTBEA6"

b'Effective systems to focus more on preventive police needed to reduce pressure on reactive policing.\nPrevention needs a sustained +comprehensive plan at grassroots levels & above. \nAnyone on criminal record must b continuously tracked & brought under watch without harrassment. https://t.co/k9uL55iQ0i'

b'From @IndiaToday \nFormer top cop Kiran Bedi suggests measures to prevent communal riots https://t.co/upH1No9Bjp via @indiatoday'
b'Today with @FloKanpur with Pooja Gupta Chairperson Kanpur and her team.  @ficci_india @FICCIFLO https://t.co/DUIsIcNoAX'

b'Seventh.
Survey of all cameras to ensure they are functional And brought under closer watch to retain their recordings by a written lawful legal direction to the people. 
And more as per the special needs. 
Prior alert people & have your own mobile vehicles to record. Use drones'

b'Sixth. \nProper area wise police arrangements be issued involving women residents of the neighbourhood. By \xe2\x80\x98women peace committees\xe2\x80\x99. \nAnd more done by local police and the respectables of the area by holding prior meetings. As preparatories..'
b'Fifth \nAny residents with weapon licenses in the area be asked to deposit their weapons in the police station for safe keeping.'
b'Fourth \nroof top searches be done to check any pile up of inflammable material  or brickbats material. Get it cleaned up by the civic agencies.'

b'(Third. 
Any persons with criminal past records if living in the area be brought under close check by use of preventive sections of law. 
Like peace bonds with sureties to Maintain peace. 
Failing which peace bonds with sureties be forfeited & the persons go to judicial custody.'

b'Second (2) \nArea Respectables be involved in acting as guardians. Like organised market associations or MAHILA Mandal\xe2\x80\x99s. \nWomen can and must play a very useful in ensuring peace. They be brought forth to take charge.'

b'Some key basics are required for preventing JP kind of riots 
1). 
Before permitting processions through congested areas and also communally sensitive follow essential strict dos and donts. 
Make residents of the areas equally responsible for safe keeping and peace keeping
Contd)'

b'This (last)Shloka explains the benefits of reciting Shiv Panchakshar Stotram.

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s #HappyFathersDay2021 Day today.
